content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); warnings: [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) that is out of fuel and holds approximately 190 units of water (~15°); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); now associated with fluid_system [80622] and providing steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) delivering water; associated with fluid_system [80622] with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a Wooden Chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 80622 (status: WORKING).
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 80621 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 80634 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 80633 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 80629 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 80638 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 80637 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 80640 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 80641 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 80642 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection and Fluid System Inconsistency:
  - Repeated connection attempts for the steam engine used fluid_system identifiers (79958, 80042, 80124, 80208, 80290, 80374, 80456, 80540) that did not match any nearby pipe groups.
  - Validate the fluid_system values of candidate pipe groups by dynamically querying the entities around the connection point.
  - Ensure synchronization between pipeline network configurations and connection attempts to avoid mismatches.
